section.name: Meta Cartridge Namespace Properties
section.p: In addition to the applicable UML Metafacade namespace properties which may also be used, this page describes namespace properties specific to this cartridge only.

tr.td: facades
The location to which metafacade interfaces are generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified for this property)
facade-logics
The location to which metafacade logic classes are generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified for this property)
facade-logic-impls
The directory to which metafacade logic implementation classes are generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified for this property)
facades-to-impls
The directory to which the metafacade-impls.properties file is generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified for this property)
metamodelVersionPackage

This is the package to which the metafacade 'Logic' classes are generated. For example for the UML 1.4 metafacades we set this property to org.andromda.metafacades.uml14, for UML 1.3 we'd set it to org.andromda.metafacades.uml13, etc).
No, defaults to the metafacade package name defined in your model.
implementationOperationNamePattern
The pattern used to the create the implementation name for metafacade operations that perform the logic of attributes, association ends, and operations, where {0} represents the operation name
No, default is handle{0}.
generalizationGetterNamePattern

The pattern used for constructing the getter name for the delegated generalizations (these are exposed to the child metafacade implementation class when a metafacade extends more than one other metafacade). {0} is the name of the generalizsation (or type if the name has not been specified).
No, default is getSuper{0}.
